testcase.name: Check Notification History Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed Then the user sees the "Notification History" text in the Menu..............passed

testcase.name: Check Notification History Screen Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed Then the user clicks on the "Notification History" text in the Menu.........passed And the user sees that the "Order Ready Notification" text exists...........passed And the user sees that the "Order Cancelled Notification" text exists.......passed

testcase.name: Check Order Ready Notification in Notification History
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the "Available Orders List" list..........................passed And the user waits "10" seconds.............................................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Available Orders Menu" text in the Menu.........passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees the "notification ready order" notification...............passed And the user closes the notifications.......................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Notification History" text in the Menu..........passed And the user sees that the "Order Ready Notification" text exists...........passed Then the user sees the Orders Ready Notification list.......................passed And the user sees the "ORDER READY" button in the Orders Ready Notification list.passed

testcase.name: Check Cancel Order Notification In Notification History
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed And the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees the "Order Details" screen................................passed And the user clicks on the "Claim" button...................................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed And the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees the "Order Details" screen................................passed And the user clicks on the "Cancel" button..................................passed And the user sees the "Cancel Order Confirmation" confirmation..............passed And the user fills the "reason cancel order" field with "I fell"............passed And the user clicks on the "YES Cancel Order" button........................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees the "notification cancel order" notification..............passed And the user closes the notifications.......................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Notification History" text in the Menu..........passed Then the user sees the Orders Cancelled Notification list...................passed And the user sees the "ORDER CANCELLED" button in the Orders Cancelled Notification list.passed

testcase.name: Check New Notification Doesn't Delete Older One
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Notification History" text in the Menu..........passed And the user sees the Orders Ready Notification list........................passed And the user sees the text button in the Orders Ready Notification list.....passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Available Orders Menu" text in the Menu.........passed And the user waits "10" seconds.............................................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Available Orders Menu" text in the Menu.........passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees the "notification ready order" notification...............passed And the user closes the notifications.......................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Notification History" text in the Menu..........passed And the user sees that the "Order Ready Notification" text exists...........passed Then the user sees the Orders Ready Notification list.......................passed And the user sees the "ORDER READY" button in the Orders Ready Notification list still exists.passed
